title: Re-rolling into Champion Permanent
body: I thought when doing this in the loot tab would give me a permanent champion token not automatically give me the new champion in my roster. I got Alistar when I did this and do not want him. Please take him back.

replies.body:
Hey there,

If you wish to have a champion removed from your champ pool you can [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support for assistance, please note that you will not receive any reimbursement for anything used to obtain the champion, champ shards, essence, etc.
